Notes
=====

* Automated multi-version testing managed with `pytest
  <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest>`_, `pytest-cov
  <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytest-cov>`_,
  `coverage <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/coverage/4.0b1>`_
  and `tox
  <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/tox>`_.
  Packaging linting with `pyroma <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pyroma>`_.

  Successfully packaged for, and
  tested against, all late-model versions of Python: 2.6, 2.7, 3.2, 3.3,
  3.4, and 3.5 pre-release (3.5.0b3) as well as PyPy 2.6.0 (based on
  2.7.9) and PyPy3 2.4.0 (based on 3.2.5).


* The author, `Jonathan Eunice <mailto:jonathan.eunice@gmail.com>`_ or
  `@jeunice on Twitter <http://twitter.com/jeunice>`_ welcomes your
  comments and suggestions. If you're using ``options`` in your own
  package, drop me a line!
